refnamediv.refpurpose: An individual contact in an addressbook.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A convenient way of accessing the contact information in EVCard objects.

refsect2.title: EContact
refsect2.para: EContact has no publicly available members.

refsect2.title: enum EContactField
EContactName
EContactGeo
EContactPhoto
EContactAddress
EContactDate
EContactCert
e_contact_new_from_vcard ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new EContact based on a vcard.

listitem.simpara: A new EContact identical to contact.

refsect2.title: e_contact_get ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of contact's field specified by field_id.

listitem.simpara: Depends on the field's type, owned by the caller.

refsect2.title: e_contact_get_const ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of contact's field specified by field_id, caching the result so it can be freed later.

listitem.simpara: Depends on the field's type, owned by the EContact.

refsect2.title: e_contact_set ()
e_contact_date_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new EContactDate based on str.

listitem.simpara: a date string in the format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYYMMDD

refsect2.title: e_contact_date_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Generates a date string in the format YYYY-MM-DD based on the values of dt.

listitem.simpara: A date string, owned by the caller.

refsect2.title: e_contact_date_equal ()
refsect2.para: Checks if dt1 and dt2 are the same date.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if dt1 and dt2 are equal, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: e_contact_name_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Generates a string representation of name.

refsect2.title: e_contact_name_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new EContactName based on the parsed name_str.

listitem.simpara: a string representing a contact's full name
A new EContactName identical to n.

refsect2.title: e_contact_date_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the date struct and its contents.

refsect2.title: e_contact_photo_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the photo struct and its contents.

refsect2.title: e_contact_geo_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the geo struct and its contents.

refsect2.title: e_contact_address_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the address struct and its contents.

refsect2.title: e_contact_field_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets the string representation of field_id.

listitem.simpara: The string representation of field_id, or NULL if it doesn't exist.

refsect2.title: e_contact_pretty_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets a human-readable, translated string representation of field_id.

listitem.simpara: The human-readable representation of field_id, or NULL if it doesn't exist.

refsect2.title: e_contact_field_id ()
refsect2.para: Gets the EContactField corresponding to the field_name.

listitem.simpara: a string representing a contact field
An EContactField corresponding to field_name, or 0 if it doesn't exist.

refsect2.title: e_contact_field_id_from_vcard ()
refsect2.para: Gets the EContactField corresponding to the vcard_field.

listitem.simpara: a string representing a vCard field
An EContactField corresponding to vcard_field, or 0 if it doesn't exist.

refsect2.title: e_contact_cert_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the cert struct and its contents.

refsect2.title: e_contact_get_attributes ()
refsect2.para: Gets a list of the vcard attributes for contact's field_id.

listitem.simpara: A GList of pointers to EVCardAttribute, owned by the caller.

refsect2.title: e_contact_set_attributes ()
refsect2.para: Sets the vcard attributes for contact's field_id.

listitem.simpara: a GList of pointers to EVCardAttribute

refsect2.title: e_contact_vcard_attribute ()
refsect2.para: Gets the vcard attribute corresponding to field_id, as a string.

listitem.simpara: The vcard attribute corresponding to field_id, or NULL if it doesn't exist.

refsect2.title: The "caluri" property
refsect2.para: The URI of the contact's calendar.
